actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the provisions of the Federal Land Policy and Management Act of 1976 relating to the acquisition of public lands.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Land Policy and Management Act of 1976 to require that lands exchanged for specified Oregon and California Railroad grant lands and Coos Bay Wagon Road grant lands in Oregon be managed in the same manner as the grant lands.

titles.title: A bill to amend the provisions of the Federal Land Policy and Management Act of 1976 relating to the acquisition of public lands.
